title: (x) Bob Marley & The Wailers album cover type - Capone {Jackie Travison}
content:
Hello-can anyone help me identify this typeface. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bobmarleytpe.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070217102142/http:/typophile.com/files/bobmarleytpe.jpg) | 20.45 KB |
author: Junkyard Dog

comments.content:
It looks like you’ve been messing with Capone… :-)

[http://www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=418158](http://web.archive.org/web/20070217102142/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=418158)

Either Medium strokes to make it heavier -  
or Bold stroked to make it a lesser weight

or someone has a Demibold out there some where….
Actually it is the typeface that is actually on the EXODUS CD. I just scanned it straight from the CD. I will look into your suggestions. Thanks very much.
